column5: It's interesting, but almost too much stuff to try watching.  It's a downer to switch from the race in HiDef to HotPass in SD.  Another bumber - Race telecast and all HotPass channels have commercials at the same time.  I might change my mind, but I doubt if I buy the package after today's free trial.  Man, those flags are starched today.  Everybody enjoy the race.
Weird, I didn't get any commercials on Hot Pass today. My cable supplier is Cogeco though as opposed to a DSS.  Great race today though!
